T02D3458:113a-1: dharma dha tu b'a g'i shvi ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3458:113a-3: chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gis grub thabs /
T02D3458:113a-5: de kho na bzhin du stong pa nyid sgoms nas
T02D3458:113a-6: chu'i dkyil 'khor la padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad
T02D3458:113a-7: pa'i ze'u 'bru la 'chi ba 'joms pa chos thams
T02D3458:113a-8: cad lhag par grol ba zhes bya'o //
T02D3458:113a-9: zla ba la gnas pa'i aam yig dkar po yongs
T02D3458:113a-10: su gyur ba las zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa mdog
T02D3458:113a-11: dkar po / rdo rje skyil krung gi steng du phyag ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can /
T02D3458:113a-12: gzhon nu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3458:113a-13: zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi skur bdag nyid skad cig gis bskyed nas /
T02D3458:113a-14: rang gis nying gar zla ba dang padma'i steng du kham yig las skyes pa'i dung /
T02D3458:113a-15: de'i dbus su aom badzra dzi h'a ram zhes pas rdo rje'i lce'o //
T02D3458:113a-16: lce'i steng du rin po che dang /
T02D3458:113a-17: padma de'i steng du sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bsam par bya'o //
T02D3458:113a-18: rang gi rkan gyi phyogs su kha thur du bstan
T02D3458:113a-19: pa bdud rtsi 'bab pa bzhin pa'i bam yig dkar
T02D3458:113a-21: aom b'a kye dam na ma zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3458:113a-22: chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba 'di dung chos kyi
T02D3458:113a-23: ting nge 'dzin mtshon pa chos kyi dbyings ngag gi
